meanings.definition: A spiritual being believed to act as an attendant, agent, or messenger of God.
meanings.sent1: Angels are said to watch over us and protect us.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe in angels and their divine guidance.
meanings.sent3: When I lost my keys, I jokingly said I needed an angel to help me find them.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like having an angel by my side during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The image of angels with wings is a common symbol of protection and comfort.

meanings.definition: A person of exemplary conduct or virtue.
meanings.sent1: She is truly an angel, always helping those in need.
meanings.sent2: In the story, the main character is portrayed as an angel for her selfless actions.
meanings.sent3: Even when faced with challenges, she remained an angel in her community.
meanings.sent4: Her generosity and compassion made her stand out like an angel among her peers.
meanings.sent5: Being an angel means spreading love and kindness wherever you go.

meanings.definition: A financial backer of a theatrical production.
meanings.sent1: The angels of the play ensured its success with their generous contributions.
meanings.sent2: Without the angels' support, the theater production would not have been possible.
meanings.sent3: The director jokingly referred to the wealthy sponsor as the 'angel' of the show.
meanings.sent4: The angel behind the scenes made sure the play had all the resources it needed.
meanings.sent5: The financial angel's investment in the play brought joy to the audience.
